CustomField.description: Total Company GDV This field was previously a picklist type (Referrer, TTV <$50m, TTV $50m - $1b, TTV >$1b).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter the classification as a whole numerical value. Abbreviated values are permitted (B - Billion, M - Million, K - Thousand) Eg 1M - Will automatically be converted to 1,000,000.
CustomField.label: Total GDV p.a.
